full_text: I'm grateful for the briefing on preparations being made for the @nationalguardMS 155th Armored Brigade Combat Team deployment to the Middle East. Let's keep them and their families in our thoughts and prayers. https://t.co/6nZ5gm2yP5

It was an honor to speak at the @nationalguardMS Guard convention today to commit to working for @USNationalGuard resources & training to carry out important #NationalSecurity & emergency relief missions. https://t.co/HWCXwFqw07

Wonderful celebration at @Airbus Columbus today to highlight the delivery of more than 400 Mississippi-made UH-72A Lakota Helicopters to the @USArmy. That’s a great credit to our skilled workforce who will continue to work for our Armed Forces. https://t.co/V2OLrZw1In

The 3.9 percent unemployment is its lowest since Dec. 2000. The #Mississippi jobless rate has also reached record lows. Let's keep moving in this terrific direction. #JobsReport https://t.co/aKhCpiolrg

quoted_status.full_text: Good news→ Since Congress passed the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, nearly 800,000 new jobs have been created.  #JobsReport https://t.co/CJ7I6287QN

.@SenatorWicker and I are among 41 Senators who believe current Title X regulations undermine the law prohibiting federal funds for programs where abortion is a method of family planning. https://t.co/v6svK8tPm3

quoted_status.full_text: .@SenHydeSmith & I are calling for a return to Reagan-era rules that would prevent taxpayer dollars from going to abortion providers. I'm proud to represent a state that is a leader in protecting the lives of the unborn. Read our statement here ➡ https://t.co/vfSGWcgyVz

full_text: Great visit to VT Halter Marine Shipbuilder in Pascagoula yesterday. It reaffirmed my commitment to keep our shipyards competitive. Their good work helps ensure US national security, while promoting commerce and good jobs for Mississippians.

Congratulations to Jameshia Attaway of Indianola & Grace McAllister of Nettleton, who were honored in D.C. with @PruSpirit of Community Awards for their exceptional youth volunteerism. See profiles of their work here: https://t.co/C0wXVpp3mz https://t.co/fl1wJH5Xco

Great to join the Chevron's Women's Network Luncheon in @PascagoulaCity today. They're part of Mississippi's strong workforce dedicated to #energy development and production. @VisitMSCoast @Chevron https://t.co/EhgCaoYk8m

This is wonderful news for all Mississippians. I'm grateful to @Toyota for its belief in our world-class workforce. Appreciate the hard work of @PhilBryantMS @mdaworks @ARCgov @CDFMS on this project. https://t.co/KanQhwi1k1

quoted_status.full_text: Announcing $170M investment in #Mississippi supporting our plan to invest $10 billion in US facilities over the next five years! https://t.co/xdJZOomqm4 https://t.co/4HXENSYpOe

full_text: Added my name as a cosponsor to the @JohnCornyn Constitutional Concealed Carry Reciprocity Act. This sensible legislation recognizes states’ authority to issue firearms licenses and permits, while supporting the rights of gun owners. #GunRights https://t.co/6crTfFWnPf
Voting to confirm Mike Pompeo to lead the @StateDept was easy. He has the confidence of @POTUS, and I believe he brings strong leadership to the role of chief diplomat for the United States.
What a blessing to have an opportunity to share time with @SenThadCochran today as he closes down his office.  We both enjoyed playing his famous baby grand piano. https://t.co/aJQfWVBkYA

Happy to vote with the Rules Committee to advance @SenatorLankford resolution to change Senate rules to get past Democratic obstruction of @POTUS judicial & executive nominees. https://t.co/If4rRd1oG5
I'm proud of MSU President Mark Keenum on his presidential appointment to lead the Board for International Food and Agricultural Development,  https://t.co/42YY3F9bfF
Pleased to join @SenPatRoberts, Agriculture Committee and @SecretarySonny at 'The State of Rural America' hearing. Farm safety net and rural infrastructure are priorities. https://t.co/QfaaQ2aWRV
Thank you for hosting, @SenJoniErnst. I enjoyed this meeting and look forward to working with you all for families. https://t.co/aVstPh6j8g

quoted_status.full_text: Had a great discussion earlier this week on working family issues with @IvankaTrump, @SenatorCollins, @SenatorFischer, and @SenHydeSmith. https://t.co/8zi5CyU9CO

quoted_status.full_text: Today, @SenHydeSmith, @CongPalazzo, and I announced  a $1 million @fema grant to construct a safe room in Forrest County. This grant will mean hundreds more Mississippians can seek refuge from our state’s unpredictable and sometimes dangerous weather. https://t.co/64UA3pEyoS

full_text: It was a pleasure to catch up with Mississippi's own Randy Reeves, the @DeptVetAffairs Under Secretary for Memorial Affairs. He served Miss. veterans well and now does so for the nation. #Veterans https://t.co/zY1M5tD1II
@SenateAgGOP Thank you, @SenPatRoberts and @SenateAgGOP.  I certainly look forward to working on this committee.  When American agriculture does well, the whole country does well.

The #TaxCutsandJobsAct is a strong start to help Mississippi families keep more of their hard-earned money & to help small businesses create jobs. Congress can do more to work with @POTUS to reduce burdensome regulations and improve our economy. #TaxDay https://t.co/YcwHPAS5b7 https://t.co/6ONhRJ0fCm

President @realDonaldTrump has named qualified executive & judicial nominees to serve the American people. Senate Democrats are wasting important time with delaying tactics. Futile & unproductive. Let’s get to work. https://t.co/V5IPvJQdwe https://t.co/s1mQo2P5pE

.@realDonaldTrump, with British and French allies, acted boldly against the atrocities of the Assad regime against its own people.  The proportional response by our brave men and women of the Armed Forces is warranted and appropriate.

Grateful for the opportunity to visit with @realDonaldTrump and @VP Pence today. They were gracious in welcoming me to the U.S. Senate and I am committed to supporting their conservative agenda.
It is a great honor to serve Mississippi as its first female U.S. Senator.  I am ready to hit the ground running, and do everything I can to represent Mississippians well. https://t.co/1k2pk4QLf2
